title: Hasbro Game Directory
desc:
Post 1165
- When played, choose 4 colors that have already been played.
- From now on, only wild cards and cards of those 4 colors can be drawn.
- Each player's turn, they may choose to convert one of their cards to one of those colors if it would not break the card.
- Hasbro Game Directory is removed when twelve cards are played.
